comment.author: 29056926@N02
comment._content: Photo is dated 12/11/11 in the title. Note the letters "NT" on the building. This should be the Alhabrama Alhambra Restaurant. Fire took place on the afternoon of December 11, 1911. NY Times. Four alarm fire contained to the Alhabrama Alhambra restaurant just south of the park lake. Dreamland, across the street from Luna Park, had just been totally ruined by fire in May.

comment.author: 8623220@N02
comment._content: Thanks roketpad!  We'll add the additional information to the date in the source data and reload the description.  Just to clarify, the spelling of the restaurant where the fire broke out was "Alhambra."

comment.author: 29056926@N02
comment._content:
Woops!  Thank you for checking my "facts" :)

I corrected the first comment just in case a later reader doesn't notice.
